abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the Phase
            One of the Rural Electrification Project is to increase
            access to electricity of rural households in villages of
            targeted provinces; and to improve the financial performance
            of the power sector. The reallocation is necessary to match
            adjustments of the scopes and actual costs of project
            activities. The original closing date of the project was
            March 31, 2010. The project's closing date was recently
            extended to March 31, 2012 to allow for the implementation
            of additional financing, to fill the financing gap of the
            project and scale up the impact of ongoing activities.
